snippet: David H. Koch, a philanthropist who was one of the American Museum of Natural HIstory’s generous benefactors, but also drew criticism from some environmentalists and scientists, had left the board of the museum, officials announced.
abstract: David H. Koch, a philanthropist who was one of the American Museum of Natural HIstory’s generous benefactors, but also drew criticism from some environmentalists and scientists, had left the board of the museum, officials announced.

headline.main: David H. Koch Leaves Natural History Museum Board
